p: Morphine (an opioid receptor agonist), and naloxone hydrochloride (an opioid receptor antagonist) were purchased from Sigma Chemical Co. (St. Louis, MO, USA). Tween-80 and formaldehyde (37%) were purchased from Merck Co. (GERBU, Germany). All drugs were dissolved in normal saline. Various doses of the EOZC were prepared in Tween-80 (0.5%). Distilled water was used to dissolve Tween-80 into 1% (v/v) and diluted with the same volume of normal saline. The control group were injected with vehicle. All drugs were prepared before use.
